content: हारिण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Belonging to a deer. --णं Venison, flesh of deer.

हारिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [हारो अस्त्यस्य इनि, हृ-णिनि वा] {@--1@} Taking, conveying, carrying. {@--2@} Robbing, taking away; वाजिंकुजराणां च हारिणः <ls>Y. 2. 273</ls>, <ls n="Y.">3. 208.</ls> {@--3@} Seizing, disturbing; <ls>Ms. 12. 28.</ls> {@--4@} Obtaining, securing. {@--5@} Attracting, captivating, pleasing, delighting, ravishing; तवास्मि गीतरागेण हारिणा प्रसभं हृतः <ls>Ś. 1. 5</ls>; <ls>Śi. 10. 13</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 10.">69</ls>; विष्टपहारिणि हरौ <ls>Bh. 2. 25.</ls> {@--6@} Surpassing, excelling. {@--7@} Having a necklace.
